##INFO

This is a test package asked as a homework within X/HEC course.

- 'draw_a_name' - a function which can plot the popularity of babynames (using prenoms) in times use the_name and  the_sex as arguments.

- 'draw_names' - a function which can plot simultaneously the popularity of more than one name

- 'multi_excel' - a function which read all sheets in excel file

- 'my_csv_reader' - returns all the excel files in one list from given folder
